checks

Class LengthsCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • checks.LengthsCheck

  • public class LengthsCheck
extends java.lang.Object
    It is the class that handles all the necessary checks about the three input sides that each user can write.

    The checks are the belows:

    1. isTriangle

    2. isEquilateral

    3. isIsosceles

    • Method Detail

      • isTriangle

        private boolean isTriangle(double side1Length,
                           double side2Length,
                           double side3Length)
        Checks the three sides if the given lengths can form a triangle.
        Parameters:
        side1Length - It is the first side of triangle.
        side2Length - It is the second side of triangle.
        side3Length - It is the third side of triangle.
        Returns:
        true for making a triangle, false for not.

      • isEquilateral

        private boolean isEquilateral(double side1Length,
                              double side2Length,
                              double side3Length)
        Checks if all sides of the triangle are the same.
        Parameters:
        side1Length - It is the first side of triangle.
        side2Length - It is the second side of triangle.
        side3Length - It is the third side of triangle.
        Returns:
        true if the triangle formed is equilateral, false if it's not.

      • isIsosceles

        private boolean isIsosceles(double side1Length,
                            double side2Length,
                            double side3Length)
        Checks if any two of the sides of the triangles are the same.
        Parameters:
        side1Length - It is the first side of triangle.
        side2Length - It is the second side of triangle.
        side3Length - It is the third side of triangle.
        Returns:
        true if the triangle formed is isosceles, false if it's not.
